EmailTemplate.name: EB-2022-03-15-202204-EMP-ENT-SEVT-Conference-Board-Free-Passes.Invite_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Get your free pass to Conference Board’s Annual Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We invite you to join us at one of the largest employee benefit events of the year in New York on April 28-29 and/or San Diego on May 10-11. We’re extending complimentary passes because we’d love for you to be our guest at The Conference Board’s 2022 Employee Health Care Conference!
Register today <[[https://www.conference-board.org/conferences/locations.cfm?conferenceid=23551]]> using Teladoc Health’s coupon code, TeladocComp, for complimentary admission to the conference and any pre-conference workshops. Passes are limited, so be sure to sign up today to reserve your seat before they’re gone!
You can meet our team at the Teladoc Health booth, and we also invite you to join our session during the conferences on Virtual care is top of mind for employers, are you unlocking the full potential? to:
- Understand our Virtual Care Transformation Model and results from leading employers, including best practices and lessons learned - Deliver a positive, healthcare experience that fits the needs of various populations - Learn about real-world strategies to streamline healthcare access and costs across today’s distributed workforce
We look forward to having you join us!
P.S. Be sure to reserve your discounted room using the links below. The conference hotel always sells out before the cut-off date, so book as early as possible. Marriott Marquis, New York <[[https://book.passkey.com/event/50279555/owner/1322/home]]>, discounted rate is $329, cut-off is April 7 Hilton Bayfront, San Diego <[[https://book.passkey.com/event/50280895/owner/71485/home]]>, discounted rate is $305, cut-off is April 15
